interestingcomments.content: @allans1976 thank you for taking the time to go through your archive to find those pictures for me. nice setup with the viewfinder btw. I have a silver one so I knid of wanted it to match the body but that hood may be necessary. thanks for the tip that it comes w/ the cap too. my only concern is that the hood is relatively short. does the hood make a big difference when shooting? thanks again!
